title: Customer Support Quality Survey
description: Help us improve our customer support by sharing your recent experience.

elements.name: overallSatisfaction
elements.title: How satisfied were you with your recent customer support experience?

elements.name: supportChannel
elements.title: Which support channel did you use?

elements.name: responseTime
elements.title: How long did you wait for a response? (in minutes)

elements.name: supportQuality
elements.title: Which aspects of the support were satisfactory? (Select all that apply)

elements.name: agentKnowledge
elements.title: How knowledgeable was the support agent?

elements.name: agentName
elements.title: If you remember, what was the name of the support agent?

elements.name: recommendSupport
elements.title: How likely are you to recommend our customer support to others?

elements.name: supportFeedback
elements.title: Please provide any additional feedback about your customer support experience:
